name: emily-marathon-split-calculator
description: Emily's Marathon Split Calculator - Flutter Web App

scripts.deploy: flutter clean && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:quick: flutter build web --release && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:verbose: flutter clean && flutter pub get && flutter analyze && flutter build web --release --verbose && firebase deploy --only hosting --debug

author: Emily
